app_description.message: Private bookmark storage. Save and protect links with a password — no one else can see them.

app_password_warning.message:
⚠️ Important: 
 If you forget your password, it cannot be recovered or reset. Your data is stored only on this device and cannot be accessed without the correct password.

app_instruction.message:
📌 To save a bookmark, click the 💾 button in the header. 
🔒 To lock bookmarks, click the 🔒 button in the header. 
👁️ To view basic bookmarks, click the 👁️ button in the header. 
🕶️ To view incognito bookmarks, click the 🕶️ button in the header.

app_ads.message: 📢 AI not giving great answers? Automate your prompts.

app_pass_short_error.message: Password must be at least 4 characters long

app_feedback_text.message: We'd be grateful if you could leave a review!
